001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.protocol.tn3270;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.ClockPort;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MessageReconstructor;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MetricsPort;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.ProtocolModule;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.FiveTuple;
008import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
009import java.util.Set;
010
011/**
012 * {@link ProtocolModule} implementation for TN3270 traffic.
013 *
014 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
015 */
016public final class Tn3270ProtocolModule implements ProtocolModule {
017  /**
018   * Creates a protocol module instance.
019   *
020   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
021   */
022  public Tn3270ProtocolModule() {}
023
024
025  private static final Set<Integer> DEFAULT_PORTS = Set.of(23, 992);
026
027  /**
028   * Identifies the TN3270 protocol id.
029   *
030   * @return {@link ProtocolId#TN3270}
031   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
032   */
033  @Override
034  public ProtocolId id() {
035    return ProtocolId.TN3270;
036  }
037
038  /**
039   * Provides default TN3270 server ports (Telnet and Telnet over TLS).
040   *
041   * @return immutable set of default ports
042   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
043   */
044  @Override
045  public Set<Integer> defaultServerPorts() {
046    return DEFAULT_PORTS;
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * Checks if the flow&apos;s early bytes resemble TN3270 Telnet negotiation.
051   *
052   * @param prefacePeek leading bytes from the stream; may be {@code null}
053   * @return {@code true} if TN3270 markers are observed
054   * @implNote Delegates to {@link Tn3270Signature}.
055   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
056   */
057  @Override
058  public boolean matchesSignature(byte[] prefacePeek) {
059    return Tn3270Signature.looksLikeTn3270(prefacePeek);
060  }
061
062  /**
063   * Creates a new {@link Tn3270MessageReconstructor} for the flow.
064   *
065   * @param flow five-tuple describing the session
066   * @param clock clock port used for timestamps
067   * @param metrics metrics sink for TN3270-specific counters
068   * @return TN3270 reconstructor
069   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code clock} or {@code metrics} is {@code null}
070   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
071   */
072  @Override
073  public MessageReconstructor newReconstructor(
074      FiveTuple flow, ClockPort clock, MetricsPort metrics) {
075    return new Tn3270MessageReconstructor(clock, metrics);
076  }
077}
